name: Looter: Skies of Battle
description:
A point and hold down the left mouse button adventure. (Escape for pause menu)

Fly the treasured skies, as hordes of planes, helicopters, and gun turrets try to keep you from the ever-increasingly powerful treasures at the ends of the ocean. Sort of a cross between Starfox and Diablo.
If you look carefully, you might find the mod support.
